title: Create the Gapminder dataset
text:
# Import necessary libraries
import pandas as pd
from gapminder import gapminder

# Rename 'lifeExp' to 'life_expectancy' and 'gdpPercap' to 'gdp_per_capita'
gapminder = gapminder.rename(columns={'lifeExp': 'life_expectancy',
                                      'pop': 'population_millions', 
                                      'gdpPercap': 'gdp_per_capita'})

# Convert population to millions
gapminder['population_millions'] = gapminder['population_millions'] / 1_000_000

# Create a new pandas DataFrame from the modified gapminder data
gapminder_df = pd.DataFrame(gapminder)

# Save the DataFrame as a CSV file
gapminder_df.to_csv('gapminder.csv', index=False)

# Print the first 3 rows of the DataFrame
print(gapminder_df.head(3))

       country continent  year  life_expectancy  population_millions  \
0  Afghanistan      Asia  1952           28.801             8.425333   
1  Afghanistan      Asia  1957           30.332             9.240934   
2  Afghanistan      Asia  1962           31.997            10.267083

title: Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita
text:
Exploring the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita across countries!
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.read_csv(“gapminder.csv”)
plt.scatter(df[“gdp_per_capita”], df[“life_expectancy”], alpha=0.5) plt.xlabel(“GDP per Capita”) plt.ylabel(“Life Expectancy”) plt.title(“Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita”) plt.show()

title: Country Analysis: India
text:
Analyzing how life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population change over time in India.
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.read_csv(“gapminder.csv”)
country = “India” country_df = df[df[“country”] == country]
plt.plot(country_df[“year”], country_df[“life_expectancy”], marker=‘o’, label=“Life Expectancy”) plt.plot(country_df[“year”], country_df[“gdp_per_capita”], marker=‘o’, label=“GDP per Capita”) plt.plot(country_df[“year”], country_df[“population_millions”], marker=‘o’, label=“Population (millions)”)
plt.xlabel(“Year”) plt.title(f”Trends in {country}“) plt.legend() plt.grid(True) plt.show()

title: Gapminder Data Overview
text: The Gapminder dataset contains information and relationships on life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for countries around the world.
